description: Grace is http://anidb.net/ch3385 [Cynthia]`s other personality - a vocal, stubborn, and tougher personality to protect herself. She is only awake when Cynthia is asleep; her birth date (6.6.) is the date of her personality split. Grace is Hanaukyou`s computer genius (and is called "Grace-sama" by most of the other maids); her department runs the super computer MEMOL.
name: Grace
